definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: They very soon came upon a Gryphon, lying fast asleep in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 她們很快就碰見了一隻鷹頭獅，正曬着太陽睡覺呢。

sentences.english: 'I should like to have it explained, ' said the Mock Turtle.
sentences.chinese: “她解釋不了，”鷹頭獅急忙說，“背下一段吧。”
